A version of '''[[Indev 0.31]]''' was released on '''January 31, 2010''', at 21:56 UTC, which added the title screen.<ref>IRC logs: "[16:56] <Notch> indev's been updated"</ref> It was announced on [[The Word of Notch|TWoN]] at 22:01 UTC.<ref>[https://web.archive.org/web/0/https://notch.tumblr.com/post/363836301/ Sunday night update]  – The Word of Notch, January 31, 2010</ref>

This version was reuploaded for the first time at 22:29 UTC.<ref>IRC logs: "[17:24] <Notch> thanks.. update for that coming"..."[17:29] <Notch> ok, the game is updated now"</ref>

This version was soon reuploaded for the second time at 22:36 UTC.<ref>IRC logs: "[17:36] <Notch> oops Peerko.. Weird.."..."[17:37] <Notch> oh, wait, refresh!"..."[17:37] <Notch> it should be fixed"</ref>

== Additions ==
=== Mobs ===
'''General'''
* Readded support for older [[mob]] models.

=== General ===
'''[[Title screen]]'''
* Comprises all of the buttons and text for both the main menu and the pause menu.
* [[File:Java Edition logo 1.png|128px]] Has a game logo made of [[cobblestone]], on a background of [[dirt]], which scrolls slowly.

'''[[Splash]]'''
* [[File:Pre-beta!.gif|64px]] The yellow text "Pre-beta!" pulsates on the menu screen 120 times per minute.

== Changes ==
=== Blocks ===
'''General'''
* Changed block shading on the sides of blocks.

'''[[File:Brown Mushroom JE2.png|32px]] [[Brown Mushroom]]s'''
* Now emit light.<ref>{{link|url=https://www.minecraftforum.net/forums/minecraft-java-edition/suggestions/6054-peri-as-an-idea-edit-glowing-mushroom|title=Glowing mushroom|website=Minecraft Forum|author=[https://www.minecraftforum.net/members/dehodson dehodson]|date=January 31, 2010|quote=Notch put this in. Congrats Peri. ... Source: minecraft.net/indev. See for yourelf. Put a brown shroom in a perfectly dark room. It glows.}}</ref><!-- Verified via gameplay of this version's jar dated January 31, 2010 22:44:48 UTC, by fully enclosing the player in opaque blocks and then placing a brown mushroom in the enclosure's darkness -->

'''[[File:Crafting Table JE2.png|32px]][[File:Crafting Table (bottom) JE2.png|32px]] [[Workbench]]'''
* Texture changed from [[File:Crafting Table JE1 BE1.png|32px]] [[File:Crafting Table (bottom) JE1.png|32px]].

'''[[File:Fire JE1.png|32px]] [[Fire]]'''
* Now deals damage.

'''[[File:Lava JE6.png|32px]] [[Lava]]'''
* Now deals damage.

'''[[File:Lava Spawner.png|32px]] [[Lava Spawner]]'''
* Now creates lava even if any previous attached lava was removed.

'''[[File:Water JE6.png|32px]] [[Water]] '''
* Texture can now be seen while underwater.
* Swimming creates bubble particles.

'''[[File:Water Spawner.png|32px]] [[Water Spawner]]'''
* Now creates water even if any previous attached water was removed.

=== Items ===
'''General'''
* Higher tier tools mine faster.
* Tools now take damage when used.
** [[Diamond]]: 257 durability
** [[Gold]]: 33 durability
** [[Iron]]: 129 durability
** [[Stone]]: 65 durability
** [[Wood]]: 33 durability

'''[[File:Flint and Steel JE2.png|32px]] [[Flint and Steel]]'''
* Flint and steel removed from the hotbar.
* Now has 65 durability.

'''{{Animate|Wooden Sword JE1 BE1.png; Stone Sword JE1 BE1.png; Iron Sword JE1 BE1.png; Golden Sword JE1.png; Diamond Sword JE1 BE1.png|32px}} [[Sword]]'''
* Swords are used to deal more damage than punching.{{verify|Is this part of -2156, or -2244?}}
** [[Diamond Sword]]: {{Health|16}}
** [[Golden Sword]]: {{Health|4}}
** [[Iron Sword]]: {{Health|12}}
** [[Stone Sword]]: {{Health|8}}
** [[Wooden Sword]]: {{Health|4}}
* Swords take 1 damage when hitting a mob and 2 damage when breaking a block.

=== Mobs ===
'''[[File:Steve JE3 BE1.png|32px]] [[Mob (entity)|Mob]]'''
* Changed texture from [[File:Rana.png|32px]][[File:Steve (mob).png|32px]][[File:Black Steve.png|32px]][[File:Beast Boy.png|32px]].
* The string/feather/sulphur drop is now chosen randomly upon death.

=== Non-mob entity ===
'''[[Player]]s'''
* Punching mobs deals {{Health|1}} damage.

=== World generation ===
* Bedrock now appears at the bottom-most 2 layers of the world.
* The lava sea only generates whenever caves cut through the top layer of bedrock.
** The bottom layer of bedrock can very rarely have gaps.

=== General ===
* Fullscreen mode now makes the hotbar, GUI's, and text slightly larger.

== Fixes ==
'''2 bugs fixed'''
* The number on hotbar items no longer pulses when new items are picked up.
* Bows no longer disappear when {{control|used}} without arrows.

'''Other'''
* Minor bug fixes.{{more info|too vague - should be replaced with examples}}
